body_html: Hmm, ComplexHalf is a bit troublesome to use with std::complex, because it only has three well defined specializations and at::Half ain't one of them. @Roger-luo, would you happen to know what a good C++ type to use in this case would be?
body_text: Hmm, ComplexHalf is a bit troublesome to use with std::complex, because it only has three well defined specializations and at::Half ain't one of them. @Roger-luo, would you happen to know what a good C++ type to use in this case would be?
body: Hmm, ComplexHalf is a bit troublesome to use with `std::complex`, because it only has three well defined specializations and `at::Half` ain't one of them. @Roger-Luo, would you happen to know what a good C++ type to use in this case would be?
